title: Oprah Interview, Mackenzie Scott, NBA All-Star Game, First Dogs and more.
itunes:title: Oprah Interview, Mackenzie Scott, NBA All-Star Game, First Dogs and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big Dog channels his inner Billy Ray Valentine. "When you think of love, gotta get it on your mind." Big ups to the ladies for a great job yesterday! The Chief Love Officer must be clear with his warning to a 13 year old cussing expert. There is still some heat from that Oprah interview with Prince Harry and Meghan Markle. Amazon head honcho Jeff Bezo's ex-wife is now on marriage #2 with a Seattle school teacher. Your favorite play cousin Junior covers The NBA All-Star festivities. Major messed it up for Champ and the first dogs have left the White House. There will be another Town Hall meeting to spread COVID-19 awareness. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve ends with saying two things. "Friendship is essential to the soul." "Loyalty has an expiration date."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
